attributes.action: Save the Cheltenham Pittville Pump Room from commercial takeover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Pump Room, which is much visited by tourists and a landmark and jewel of the town of Cheltenham is threatened with commercial takeover. We therefore petition the Prime Minister to use all means in his power to prevent this and make it known our opposition to this to all concerned.
